stat_folder.description: Where the files used to define normalisation statistics are located

stat_version.description: Whether the stat files incorporate rainfall

log_transform_iteration.description: How many transforms of type x-> log(1+x) are applied on rainfalll data

symetrization.description: If the rr skewed variable should be randomly symetrized (adding - signs) during training

gaussian_std.description: Whether to add pointwise gaussian noise below a certain threshold

func.description: Which type of normalization is performed on all variables (using minmax --> min and max // mean --> mean and |max-mean| // quant --> Q01 and Q99)

per_pixel.description: Whether normalization is performed used global scalars, or constant grids

blur_iteration.description: Whether per_pixel constant grids should be blurred with gaussian kernel, and how many times. Applied only if per_pixel is true.
